Title: THE MANLY BUILD FOR THE ELECTRIC MAN

ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: IF YOU DECIDE YOU DON'T WANT TO BUILD BASI BECAUSE SOMEONE ELSE IS DOING THAT, GET 2 SLIPPERS FOR SICK DAMAGE OR GAUNTLET+CIRCLET FOR FASTER DRUMS.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: IT'S GONNA HAPPEN AT SOME POINT.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: YOU GO SLOW UNTIL YOU LEVELED YOUR PASSIVE, ALSO YOUR BASE DAMAGE IS TRASHCAN. GET THIS TO GO FAST AND ZAP LIKE TREANT PROTECTOR. POWER TREADS ARE ALSO LEGITIMATE CHOICE IF YOU'RE NOT GOING TO BE DOING MUCH RUNNING AROUND AND NEED MORE HP, BUT PHASE ARE THE CHOICE OF REAL MEN.
ItemTooltips.vitality_booster: GET THIS BEFORE OR AFTER MANTA SO YOU CAN BE ALIVE MORE. DO NOT GET VANGUARD, ONLY SCRUBS DO THAT.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: IF YOU'RE PLAYING MID AND THERE'S NO MEK CARRIER ON YOUR TEAM THIS IS SUPER GOOD FIRST ITEM.
ItemTooltips.pipe: NOT AS GOOD AS MEK BUT ONCE AGAIN, IF YOU'RE NOT EXPECTED TO BE THE HARDEST CARRY ON YOUR TEAM AND NOBODY ELSE IS BUYING IT WHILE ENEMY TEAM HAS KOTL AND QOP YOU MIGHT AS WELL DO IT.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: IN SOME RARE OCCASIONS, A MAN JUST WANTS TO GO EVEN FASTER THAN HE DID BEFORE AND HAVE EASIER TIME BEING A DAMAGE VACUUM (EULING STATIC LINK'S TARGET DOESN'T BREAK THE LINK). HOWEVER, ALL THE STATS BESIDES MOVEMENT SPEED ARE KINDA WASTED SO I WOULD ONLY RECOMMEND GETTING IT FOR SHITS AND GIGGLES.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: WITH 6.78 THIS THING IS GOOD. ~3 ZAPS PER SECOND IS STRONG, STATS IT GIVES ARE MOSTLY DECENT AND IT TURNS YOU INTO A PUSHLORD BEAR RAPIST.
ItemTooltips.refresher: SEIZURE WARNING. GET THIS ONLY IF YOU GOT AGHANIM'S, NOT WORTH IT BY ITSELF.
ItemTooltips.heart: GET THIS IF YOU'RE DYING FAST AND WANT TO LIVE MORE.
ItemTooltips.sphere: IT GOT SOME ADDITIONAL UTILITY WITH THE ADDED ACTIVE BUT IT'S STILL SUPER EXPENSIVE AND SITUATIONAL. GET IT IF THAT BUTTHOLE BATRIDER OR BEASTMASTER MADE IT HIS LIFE GOAL TO ULT YOU. ALSO SHIELD TEAMMATES FROM PROJECTILES LIKE YOU'RE A PROFESSIONAL PLAYER.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: OH YOU WANT TO LIVE MORE? THEN A GODDAMN VITALITY BOOSTER YOU NERD, DON'T WASTE ALL THAT MONEY ON A AN ITEM THAT WORKS LIKE SHIT ON YOUR HERO.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: GET IT AFTER YOU GOT HEART IF YOU'RE SWIMMING IN GOLD.
ItemTooltips.manta: BEST ITEM IN GAME, MAKES YOU GO EVEN MORE FAST AND GIVES YOU LITERALLY EVERY STAT YOU WANT.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: YOU KNOW HOW THIS GOES: LINK, USE THIS GUY AND THEN YOU GET AN EASY FULL DURATION LINK UNLESS YOUR ENEMY IS SMART ENOUGH TO BUY RADARS. IF THEY REFUSE TO DO THAT, THIS ITEM WILL PROBABLY WIN YOU THE GAME.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: AFTER GETTING BUFFED FOR 20 YEARS SNY IS NOW LEGIT ON MANY HEROES, RAZOR INCLUDED. GET IT INSTEAD OF MANTA IF YOU LIKE GOING EVEN FASTER AND THERE ISN'T ANYTHING YOU NEED TO DISJOINT.
ItemTooltips.satanic: PROBABLY THIS. ALTERNATIVELY, IF YOU SOMEHOW ONLY HAVE 4 SLOTS FILLED, GET BOTH.
ItemTooltips.skadi: IF YOU DON'T GET DESO AND IT'S 60 MINUTES IN, WHAT ELSE CAN YOU WISH FOR?
ItemTooltips.desolator: IF YOU'RE NOT DYING FAST THEN GET THIS SO YOUR ENEMIES DIE FASTER.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: MORE HP, MORE GOING FAST GET THIS INSTEAD OF AQUILA IF YOU WANT TO GO FASTER INSTEAD OF CASTING MORE.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: SIMILARLY TO EUL'S, THIS KID GIVES YOU AN EASIER TIME STRIPPING THEM NERDS OF THEIR DAMAGE, BUT INSTEAD OF SPEED PROVIDES A SICK CHUNK OF HP. STILL, YOU'RE WASTING 2K GOLD ON A STAT THAT YOU DON'T REALLY NEED, SO I WOULDN'T RECOMMEND GETTING IT UNLESS YOU'RE HELLBENT ON NOT MAKING A HEART.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: SOMETIMES A MAN JUST WANTS TO STOP THAT GODDAMN BEAR FROM KILLING HIS WHOLE TEAM AND PREVENTING HIM FROM GOING FAST. DODGE IS OKAY AND (SOMETIMES) SLOW IS ALSO OKAY.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: YOU HAVE 3 ACTIVE SPELLS AND YOU ALSO WANT SURVIVABILITY AND DAMAGE, GET THIS MOTHER HUGGER AND IT WILL SOLVE ALL OF THESE PROBLEMS (KINDA).

AbilityTooltips.razor_plasma_field: HUGE ASS AOE DAMAGE IF YOU CAN AIM IT PROPERLY. THE AOE IS ACTUALLY A BIT BIGGER THAN THE VISUAL EFFECT, TAKES A LITTLE BIT TO GET USED TO. WHEN GANKING YOU WANT TO SAVE IT TILL THE LAST MOMENT WHEN THE GANKED GUY RUNS AWAY LIKE A PUSSY TO GET AS MUCH DAMAGE AS POSSIBLE.
AbilityTooltips.razor_static_link: THIS KID RIGHT HERE IS THE REASON YOU PICKED RAZOR, DON'T EVEN TRY TO HIDE IT. IN SOME LANES YOU CAN MAX THIS FIRST, BUT FIELD IS GENERALLY MORE USEFUL FOR FARMING AND SHIT. ALSO, LINK THAT GODDAMN BEAR.
AbilityTooltips.razor_unstable_current: SINCE THE ULT BUFF IN 6.78, YOU GENERALLY DON'T WANT TO FAVOR LEVELING THIS INSTEAD. GET ONE POINT AT LEVEL 4 IF THERE'S A REALLY ANNOYING SINGLE TARGET SPELL IN YOUR LANE (OR BRISTLEBACK IN THE ENEMY TEAM), MAX LAST.
AbilityTooltips.razor_eye_of_the_storm: WHILE THE 6.78 DIDN'T TURN THIS INTO THE BEST ULT IN THE GAME, IT'S A LOT STRONGER NOW. CONFIRMED BEST BEAR REPELLANT EU.
